```{r}
library(oce)
files <- c(
    "~/Downloads/byg.ad2cp",
    "~/Downloads/med.ad2cp",
    "~/git/oce/tests/testthat/local_data/ad2cp/S102791A002_Barrow_v2.ad2cp",
    "~/git/oce/tests/testthat/local_data/ad2cp/S102791A002_Barrow_v2_avgd.ad2cp",
    "~/git/oce/tests/testthat/local_data/ad2cp/ad2cp_01.ad2cp")
for (file in files)
{
    cat(file, "\n")
    print(read.adp.ad2cp(file, which="?"))
}
